CustomField.description: If this residence is a condo or a member of a Multi-Unit-Complex, this field holds the Unit/Flat/Suite/etc.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If this residence is a condo or a member of a Multi-Unit-Complex, this field holds the Unit/Flat/Suite/etc. Note that when this Residence is a member of a Multi-Unit-Complex, we will append the unit to the end of the APN to create the APN_Unique value.
CustomField.label: Unit
